name: Supermarket Shopping for Kids
description:
Does your kid love educational games and want to go shopping in the best supermarket ?
If your child want to play in the supermarket you have found the right educational game !
Let's go to do the shopping !
Buy food, fruits and vegetables, toys and clothes, go to the checkout !
This supermarket is so much fun ! Let's be the best shopper or worker of the supermarket !

These kids need your help ! Choose among 4 adorable games and let the fun begin!
Shopping, recycling, fruit cutting and cleaning : complete all the levels and get all the stars !
Check the counter fridge, do you need something ?
Buy all groceries you need.

This app is a challenging and fun way to develop fine motor skills, visual perception and hand-eye coordination
in the world of shopping games.

Supermarket Shopping for Kids is simple and fun :
* Open the game and choose the level that you want to play
* Shopping: use the shopping cart, follow the shopping list and go to the cashier to pay
* recycling: put all garbage in the right trash !
* fruit cutting: cut all fruits and vegetables with your finger but do not touch the bomb
* cleaning: clean and make the supermarket shine
* learn all the different activities in the supermarket !
* be the boss of the shopping center !
* tap the arrow button at the end of a game to change scene

Today the supermarket is crowded, and the kids are waiting your help with the shopping list.
Can you help these adorable kids in this supermarket game ?
Help these little customers to find the food they want !
If your toddler loves to play with shopping game this is the best game for your child.

Supermarket Shopping for Kids is a must have app for kids. Features:
-game for toddlers and kids from ages 2-13 years old, suitable for the whole family
-Optimized for tablets (Sony , Samsung, Kindle)
-entertaining and educational game
-easy to use for children and preschoolers, babies, little boys and little girls
-simple and intuitive : just a few commands to use
-exercise your toddler fine motor skills
-Promotes problem-solving skills and hand-eye coordination
-4 games to choose from
-real life shopping center activities
-like going to the supermarket with Mom or Dad
-grocery store game for girls and boys
-give kids an idea of how supermarkets and shopping malls work
-Help customers with grocery in this baby shop, run the cash register and bills
-lot of different fun activities to do in the supermarket

Help your kids to learn and inspire your toddler's creativity and imagination in this supermarket game !
Play with the best shopping game for kids, become the best supermarket girl or boy in the world!
The kids need your help in this shopping mall ! Run the coolest supermarket in the city !

Have fun with BATOKI ! Best Apps for TOddlers and KIds
developers: BATOKI - Best Apps for Toddlers and Kids
